Articles.Content:
Is there a mod that adds domes to the game that are compatible with tweak scale?

Edited September 8, 2018 by KerbolExplorer

27 minutes ago, KerbolExplorer said:

Is there a mod that adds domes to the game that are compatible with tweak scale?

and you can use  

@PART[airlock] 
{
    %MODULE[TweakScale]
    {
        %name = TweakScale
        %type = free
    }
}

@PART[DomeFloor] 
{
    %MODULE[TweakScale]
    {
        %name = TweakScale
        %type = free
    }
}

@PART[DomeFloorLarge] 
{
    %MODULE[TweakScale]
    {
        %name = TweakScale
        %type = free
    }
}

@PART[DomeHex] 
{
    %MODULE[TweakScale]
    {
        %name = TweakScale
        %type = free
    }
}

@PART[DomeHexl] 
{
    %MODULE[TweakScale]
    {
        %name = TweakScale
        %type = free
    }
}

@PART[dome_large] 
{
    %MODULE[TweakScale]
    {
        %name = TweakScale
        %type = free
    }
}

@PART[dome_small] 
{
    %MODULE[TweakScale]
    {
        %name = TweakScale
        %type = free
    }
}

@PART[tunnel] 
{
    %MODULE[TweakScale]
    {
        %name = TweakScale
        %type = free
    }
}
